basics.name: Mallorga Yuliana
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
summary: Full Stack Web Developer with 3 years of experience in building modern, scalable, and efficient web applications. Specialized in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with expertise in frameworks like React, Vite, Bootstrap, Tailwind, and Astro, as well as backend technologies such as Node.js and Express.js. Additionally, experienced in databases like PostgreSQL.

Passionate about developing high-quality software, applying best practices such as TDD and Clean Code. Skilled in responsive web design, ensuring adaptable and optimized interfaces across different devices. Strong team player with experience in project management, having served as a Scrum Master in two projects.
Committed to continuous learning and the adoption of cutting-edge technologies to develop innovative, scalable, and high-performance solutions.

work.name: Personal Project
summary: Developed a web application using React, Vite, and Tachyons, improving the UI/UX experience.
Integrated a REST API (Clarifai) using Axios for efficient data consumption.
Implemented the backend with Node.js and Express.js, managing the database with PostgreSQL.
Deployed the application to the cloud for public access.
highlights: Full Stack Developer with experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Vite, Astro Bootstrap, Tailwind, Node.js, Express.js and PostgreSQL.
Implementation of RESTful APIs and optimization of SQL and NoSQL databases.
Application of TDD and Clean Code to improve software quality.
Experience with cloud deployment using Netlify and Render.
Work in agile teams with Scrum and GitHub Projects.

projects.name: Blog anime
projects.description: This project is a website with an anime blog theme. On our page, you will find different sections such as the image gallery, about us, login, contact, in addition to the home page. Our website is carefully designed with an attractive and easy to navigate interface, created with HTML and CSS.

projects.name: Filmax
projects.description: The project consists of a web page with a catalog of movies and series, in the style of Netflix, HBO Max, Cuevana, among other examples. Here you can see, add, edit, delete movies and series, through an admin page. It also allows registering and entering a user.

projects.name: Tic-Tac-Toe Game
projects.description: The 'Tic-Tac-Toe Game' is a project that creates an online version of the classic 'Tic-Tac-Toe' game. It uses React and React DOM to develop the user interface, Vite as the development environment, and ESLint rules to ensure clean code. Two players compete in real-time, and when one wins, it appears on the screen, ending the game.

projects.name: Twitter Follow Card
projects.description: The Twitter Follow Card Component project focuses on developing a custom component for web applications using React. This component will allow developers to easily integrate Twitter follow cards into their sites with customization options. Vite is used as the development environment, and ESLint rules are applied to maintain code quality.

projects.name: WorldSurveys - Final Project
projects.description: It is an app made with ReactJS with a survey theme, in which the admin can register surveys, modify them, view them and delete them. In it, tools such as React Router Dom are used to manage the routes that allow us to navigate between the different pages and JSON Server to simulate an external API.
